org.mini2Dx.core.font

Class MonospaceGameFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.font.MonospaceGameFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameFont

    public class MonospaceGameFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameFont
    A GameFont where every character is a fixed-width which simplifies rendering calculations

        public boolean loadInternal()

        public void draw(Graphics g,

                 float renderWidth,
                 int horizontalAlignment,
                 boolean wrap)
        Description copied from interface: GameFont
        Draws text to the Graphics context using this font
        Specified by:
        draw in interface GameFont
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        str - The text to render
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        renderWidth - The target width to render with
        horizontalAlignment - The horizontal alignment within the targetWidth. See Align
        wrap - True if text should wrap if exceeding targetWidth, false if it should clip
